Public Class ShapedQueryExpression Inherits Expression Implements IPrintableExpression
type ShapedQueryExpression = class inherit Expression interface IPrintableExpression

summary.para: An expression that combines a query expression and shaper expression.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.param: The query expression to get results from server.
The shaper expression to create result objects from server results.
